verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> our Lord, <S%H3068><s%> how majestic <S%H117><s%> is your name <S%H8034><s%> in all the earth, <S%H776><s%> who has set <S%H5414><s%> your glory <S%H1935><s%> above the heavens! <S%H8064><s%>

From the lips <S%H6310><s%> of babes <S%H5768><s%> and infants <S%H3243><s%> you have established <S%H3245><s%> strength, <S%H5797><s%> because of your adversaries, <S%H6887><s%> that you might silence <S%H7673><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> and the avenger. <S%H5358><s%>

When I consider <S%H7200><s%> your heavens, <S%H8064><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of your fingers, <S%H676><s%> the moon <S%H3394><s%> and the stars, <S%H3556><s%> which you have ordained; <S%H3559><s%>
what is man, <S%H582><s%> that you think <S%H2142><s%> of him? <S%H1121><s%> What is the son of man, <S%H120><s%> that you care for him? <S%H6485><s%>
For you have made him a little <S%H4592><s%> lower <S%H2637><s%> than God, <S%H430><s%> and crowned <S%H5849><s%> him with glory <S%H3519><s%> and honor. <S%H3519><s%>
You make him ruler <S%H4910><s%> over the works <S%H4639><s%> of your hands. <S%H3027><s%> You have put <S%H7896><s%> all things under his feet: <S%H7272><s%>
All sheep <S%H6792><s%> and cattle, <S%H504><s%> yes, <S%H929><s%> and the animals of the field, <S%H7704><s%>
The birds <S%H6833><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> the fish <S%H1709><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and whatever passes through <S%H5674><s%> the paths <S%H734><s%> of the seas. <S%H3220><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> our Lord, <S%H3068><s%> how majestic <S%H117><s%> is your name <S%H8034><s%> in all the earth! <S%H776><s%>
